docs.text: This Java library provides a JSON parser. The parser reads a JSON text, parses it in accordance with RFC 8259 and creates a corresponding data structure in Java.
docs.title: Java JSON Parser

docs.text:
Add the following dependency to your build file:
Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>com.github.tnakamot</groupId>
  <artifactId>json-parser</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.5-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'com.github.tnakamot', name: 'json-parser', version: '0.0.5-SNAPSHOT'
} sbt libraryDependencies += "com.github.tnakamot" % "json-parser" % "0.0.5-SNAPSHOT"
docs.title: Setup
Usage

docs.text: The latest source code is available at GitHub.
docs.title: Source Code

docs.text:
Javadoc of the latest version is available here.
Javadoc of old versions is available as jar files in Maven Repository. For example, the javadoc jar file of version 0.0.4 can be found here.
docs.title: Javadoc
